snippet: Gov. Sam Brownback’s $4.1 billion plan to overhaul public school funding passed the Senate on Monday, but a District Court order last week signaled that the plan may be blocked before it gets off the ground.
abstract: Kansas Gov Sam Brownback’s $4.1 billion plan to overhaul public school funding passes State Senate, but District Court order indicates plan may be blocked due to pending case.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Sam Brownback’s $4.1 billion plan to overhaul public school funding passed the Senate on Monday, but a District Court order last week signaled that the plan may be blocked before it gets off the ground.

headline.main: Kansas: School Funding Approved as Questions Persist
headline.print_headline: Kansas: School Funding Approved as Questions Persist
